title: Connectivist-Based Collaborative Writing Support MOOC for Greek Language Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Learners develop instructional design skills applicable to real classroom settings, with a focus on collaborative writing activities using Google Docs.

learning_goals: Learners can independently design collaborative writing educational scenarios using MOOC platforms and Google Docs
Learners can share instructional design ideas and provide feedback through interactions with peer learners
Learners can operationalize teacher professional development strategies by applying connectivist learning principles
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
